description: McAfee VirusScan Enterprise is an anti-virus program that is used to detect and remove malware . VirusScan Enterprise includes a component called the McAfee Agent, which is used to deploy and update VirusScan. When a VirusScan update occurs, the program downloads several update-related files, including MCS files.
MCS files are scripts that McAfee Agent uses to perform various update processes. In addition to DATInstall.mcs , you may encounter MCS files named:
